item.text: “‘When you allot the land as an inheritance, you will offer an allotment to the Lord, a holy portion from the land; the length will be 8¼ miles and the width 3⅓ miles. This entire area will be holy.

Of <st data-num="02088" class="">this</st> area a <st data-num="07251 05439">square</st> <st data-num="02568 03967">875</st> feet<n id="1" /> by <st data-num="02568 03967">875</st> feet will <st data-num="01961" class="">be designated</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">for</st> the <st data-num="06944" class="">sanctuary</st>, with <st data-num="02572" class="">87½</st> <st data-num="0520" class="">feet</st><n id="2" /> set aside for its <st data-num="04054" class="">open space</st> <st data-num="05439" class="">round about</st>.

<st data-num="04480" class="">From</st> <st data-num="02063" class="">this</st> <st data-num="04060" class="">measured area</st> you will <st data-num="04058" class="">measure</st> a <st data-num="0753" class="">length</st> of <st data-num="02568 06242 0505">8¼</st> miles<n id="1" /> and a <st data-num="07341" class="">width</st> of <st data-num="06235 0505">3⅓</st> miles;<n id="2" /> in it will <st data-num="01961" class="">be</st> the <st data-num="04720" class="">sanctuary</st>, the <st data-num="06944" class="">Most</st> <st data-num="06944" class="">Holy Place</st>.

It will be a holy portion of the land; it will be for the priests, the ministers of the sanctuary who approach the Lord to minister to him. It will be a place for their houses and a holy place for the sanctuary.
An area 8¼ miles in length and 3⅓ miles in width will be for the Levites, who minister at the temple, as the place for the cities in which they will live.
“‘Alongside the portion set apart as the holy allotment, you will allot for the city an area 1⅔ miles wide and 8¼ miles long; it will be for the whole house of Israel.

“‘For the prince there will be land on both sides of the holy allotment and the allotted city, on the west side and on the east side; it will be comparable in length to one of the portions, from the west border to the east border
of the land. This will be his property in Israel. My princes will no longer oppress my people, but the land will be allotted to the house of Israel according to their tribes.

“‘This is what the Sovereign Lord says: Enough, you princes of Israel! Put away violence and destruction and do what is just and right. Put an end to your evictions of my people, declares the Sovereign Lord.

You must <st data-num="01961" class="">use</st> <st data-num="06664" class="">just</st> <st data-num="03976" class="">balances</st>,<n id="1" /> a <st data-num="06664" class="">just</st> dry measure (an <st data-num="0374" class="">ephah)</st>,<n id="2" /> and a <st data-num="06664" class="">just</st> liquid measure (a <st data-num="01324" class="">bath)</st>.<n id="3" />

The <st data-num="0374" class="">dry</st> and <st data-num="01324" class="">liquid</st> <st data-num="08506" class="">measures</st> will <st data-num="01961" class="">be</st> the <st data-num="0259" class="">same</st>: The <st data-num="01324" class="">bath</st> will <st data-num="05375" class="">contain</st> a <st data-num="04643" class="">tenth</st> of a <st data-num="02563" class="">homer</st>,<n id="1" /> and the <st data-num="0374" class="">ephah</st> a <st data-num="06224" class="">tenth</st> of a <st data-num="02563" class="">homer</st>; the <st data-num="0413 02563">homer</st> will <st data-num="01961" class="">be</st> the <st data-num="04971" class="">standard measure</st>.
The shekel will be 20 gerahs. Sixty shekels will be a mina for you.
“‘This is the offering you must offer: a sixth of an ephah from a homer of wheat, a sixth of an ephah from a homer of barley,

and as the <st data-num="02706" class="">prescribed portion</st> of <st data-num="08081 01324 08081">olive oil</st>, <st data-num="04643" class="">one-tenth</st> of a <st data-num="01324" class="">bath</st> <st data-num="04480" class="">from</st> each <st data-num="03734" class="">cor</st> (which is <st data-num="06235" class="">ten</st> <st data-num="01324" class="">baths</st> or a <st data-num="02563" class="">homer</st>, <st data-num="03588" class="">for</st> <st data-num="06235" class="">ten</st> <st data-num="01324" class="">baths</st> make a <st data-num="02563" class="">homer</st>);
and one sheep from each flock of 200, from the watered places of Israel, for a grain offering, burnt offering, and peace offering, to make atonement for them, declares the Sovereign Lord.

<st data-num="03605" class="">All</st> the <st data-num="05971" class="">people</st> of the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> will <st data-num="01961" class="">contribute</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> <st data-num="02063" class="">this</st> <st data-num="08641" class="">offering</st> for the <st data-num="05387" class="">prince</st> of <st data-num="03478" class="">Israel</st>.

It will be the duty of the prince to provide the burnt offerings, the grain offering, and the drink offering at festivals, on the new moons and Sabbaths, at all the appointed feasts of the house of Israel; he will provide the sin offering, the grain offering, the burnt offering, and the peace offerings to make atonement for the house of Israel.
“‘This is what the Sovereign Lord says: In the first month, on the first day of the month, you must take an unblemished young bull and purify the sanctuary.

The <st data-num="03548" class="">priest</st> will <st data-num="03947" class="">take</st> some of the <st data-num="01818" class="">blood</st> of the <st data-num="02403" class="">sin offering</st> and <st data-num="05414" class="">place</st> it <st data-num="0413" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="04201" class="">doorpost</st> of the <st data-num="01004" class="">temple</st>, <st data-num="0413" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="0702" class="">four</st> <st data-num="06438" class="">corners</st> of the <st data-num="05835" class="">ledge</st> of the <st data-num="04196" class="">altar</st>, and <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="04201" class="">doorpost</st> of the <st data-num="08179" class="">gate</st> of the <st data-num="06442" class="">inner</st> <st data-num="02691" class="">court</st>.
This is what you must do on the seventh day of the month for anyone who sins inadvertently or through ignorance; so you will make atonement for the temple.
“‘In the first month, on the fourteenth day of the month, you will celebrate the Passover, and for the seven days of the festival bread made without yeast will be eaten.

On <st data-num="01931" class="">that</st> <st data-num="03117" class="">day</st> the <st data-num="05387" class="">prince</st> will <st data-num="06213" class="">provide</st> <st data-num="01157" class="">for</st> himself and <st data-num="01157" class="">for</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="05971" class="">people</st> of the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> a <st data-num="06499" class="">bull</st> for a <st data-num="02403" class="">sin offering</st>.

And during the seven days of the feast he will provide as a burnt offering to the Lord seven bulls and seven rams, all without blemish, on each of the seven days, and a male goat daily for a sin offering.

He will <st data-num="06213" class="">provide</st> as a <st data-num="04503" class="">grain offering</st> an <st data-num="0374" class="">ephah</st> for each <st data-num="06499" class="">bull</st>, an <st data-num="0374" class="">ephah</st> for each <st data-num="0352" class="">ram</st>, and a <st data-num="01969" class="">gallon</st><n id="1" /> of <st data-num="08081" class="">olive oil</st> for each <st data-num="0374" class="">ephah</st> of grain.<n id="2" />

In the seventh month, on the fifteenth day of the month, at the feast, he will make the same provisions for the sin offering, burnt offering, and grain offering, and for the olive oil, for the seven days.
